DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study analyze compare immunogenicity Bivalent Tetravalent vaccine Human Papillomavirus HIV-infected adult person .
DOC.brief_title: Immune Response Bivalent Tetravalent Human Papillomavirus Vaccine HIV Infected Adults
DOC.criteria: HIV positive subject . Age 18 time first vaccination . Written inform consent obtain subject . Subjects investigator believe comply requirement protocol . If currently antiretroviral therapy ( ART ) , subject must compliant triple therapy ( highly active ART ) undetectable viral load period six month prior study entry . Female subject nonchildbearing potential may enrol study . Female subject childbearing potential may enrol study , subject negative pregnancy test screen day vaccination , agree continue adequate contraception entire treatment period . Previous vaccination HPV , plan administration HPV vaccine foreseen study protocol study period ( Day 0 Month 12 ) . Pregnant breastfeed female . Previous enrollment study . Subjects investigator believe and/or comply requirement protocol ( i.e . abuse drug alcohol , dementia give medical , psychiatric , social work related condition ) . Chronic administration immunosuppressive drug Cancer autoimmune disease Previous allergic reaction vaccination Known allergy towards component either test drug .
